column1: Uchi////Everything tasted perfect and delicious. I would recommend 1 sake set if you're just drinking casually because it was actually hard to finish 2. And we are hard hitters when it comes to sushi
column2: sake bombs and hh. They gave us free stir fried Brussels sprouts because our order was taking a bit. Now I have a new found love for fried Brussels sprouts. But honestly anything on the menu was great and didn't feel like I was just eating rice and raw fish.
